effect.short: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.full: Deals regular damage.  Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavorTexts.text:
The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is
restored by over half of the damage taken by
the target.
